name: Arghh, There’s a Killer Chasing Me!
storyline:
You wake up in the middle of the Woods and find your girlfriend dead…during your date! Of all the times to die, she dies during your date?! That’s a pretty crappy date, if you ask me! So, you dump her and run into some weirdo in a costume. What? It’s not even Halloween yet, buddy!

But this weirdo doesn’t seem to care. Next thing you know, their hands are wrapped around your neck as they’re trying to strangle you! “Oh My Gosh!” You think… “This maniac is tryna kill me! I gotta get outta here!” You fight back and escape, but this weirdo is still stalking you! Then they take out a knife. Oh My! This guy means business and while running away you scream “ARGHH, there’s a killer chasing me!”

Yeah…worst date ever.
summary: Arghh, There’s a Killer Chasing Me! is a comedy survival horror game where you play as Adam who is being hunted by a killer in the woods. Your objective is to escape…preferably with your insides still on the inside.
